details.name: Material
details.value: Merbau wooden frame & floor, tempered glass, Imported acrylic

details.name: Function
details.value: Touch screen wireless control panel, FM radio & CD connection, Temperature/Time setting, Top color changing light, 4.5KW steam generator, Child-lock function, Handle shower tap with constant temperature function

details.name: Others
details.value:
1.The material of wooden frame & floor is optional.
2.The acrylic can be Chinese acrylic or ABS.
3.Domestic steam generator can upgrade to Imported Harvia 4.5KW steam generator.
